content: Investments Robo-Advisors Stocks Equities Securities Asked by Vance KangAsked on 11 May 2019is it a bad time to be proportioning highly in equity during such a late market cycle in autowealth?1 answerAnswerBump0

Cedric Jamie Soh, Director at Seniorcare.com.sgTop Contributor (Sep)Level 7. Grand MasterAnswered on 17 Sep 2019The last stage of a bull market is the most powered and strongest.Of course, if you enter just before the bear starts, it's going to be a bad decision.The question is: how can I know when is the start or end of the Bull/Bear market?I can't... I am not that good. So I stay invested always, and keep adding, bull or bear. :D0 comments1
